text: "Cowboys Don't Shoot Straight (Like They Used To)" is a 1981 song by country singer Tammy Wynette and is the leading single from her 22nd studio album You Brought Me Back. It went to number 21 on the Billboard Hot Country Singles chart and number 36 on the Canadian RPM Country Singles charts. ==Track listing== ;7" vinyl single * "Cowboys Don't Shoot Straight (Like They Used To)" – 2:54 * "You Brought Me Back" – 4:00 == References == Category:1981 songs Category:Country songs Category:Tammy Wynette songs
title: Cowboys Don't Shoot Straight (Like They Used To)
